#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int main() {
    int t;
    cin >> t;
    for(int p=0;p<t;p++){
        string s;
        cin >> s;
        int len=s.length();
        int flag=0;
        for(int i=0;i<len;i++){
            if(s[i]=='a' || s[i]=='e' || s[i]=='i' || s[i]=='o' || s[i]=='u'){
                flag=1;
                break;
            }
        }
        if(flag==1){
            cout << "yes" << endl;
        }
        else{
            cout << "no" << endl;
        }
    }
	// your code goes here
	return 0;
}
